TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ReflectionPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class ReflectionPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class ReflectionPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type ReflectionPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 通过 API 控制对非公共类型和成员的访问。

span.span: Controls access to non-public types and members through the APIs.

summary.span: 控制 API 的一些功能。

span.span: Controls some features of the APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无需，代码可以使用反射来访问对象的公共成员。Without , code can use reflection to access only the public members of objects. 使用代码适当标志可以访问`protected`和`private`对象的成员。Code with and the appropriate flags can access the `protected` and `private` members of objects. > [!CAUTION] > 因为可以提供访问非公共类型和成员，我们建议不要授予到 Internet 的代码中，除了标志。Because can provide access to non-public types and members, we recommend that you do not grant to Internet code, except with the flag. 允许访问非公共成员，必须为非公共成员的授予集等于，限制或用于访问非公共成员的代码的授予集的子集。 allows access to non-public members, with the restriction that the grant set of the non-public members must be equal to, or a subset of, the grant set of the code that accesses the non-public members. 反射的某些功能发出，例如发出调试符号，需要与标志。Certain features of reflection emit, such as emitting debug symbols, require with the flag. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration.

span.span: Security Considerations for Reflection

related.span: 反射发出中的安全问题

span.span: Security Issues in Reflection Emit

Public Overrides Function Copy () As IPermission

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#4)]

exception.span: 参数不是 ，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
